tier_2_material.motive_for_crime: Theft and robbery leading to murder

tier_3_contextual.place_of_offense: Flat No.1, Aruovilla building, St. Andrewâ€™s road, Santacruz (West), Mumbai

tier_4_procedural.case_number: Criminal Appeal No. 920 of 2000 and Criminal Appeal No. 738 of 2000
tier_4_procedural.case_title: Bhim @ Raju @ Shankar Gundayya Maku vs. The State of Maharashtra and Shreenu @ Shriniwas Rajanna Pendari vs. The State of Maharashtra
tier_4_procedural.court_name: High Court of Judicature at Bombay
tier_4_procedural.appellant_or_petitioner: Bhim @ Raju @ Shankar Gundayya Maku, Shreenu @ Shriniwas Rajanna Pendari
tier_4_procedural.judges_coram: V.G. Palshikar & Anoop V. Mohta, JJ.

residual_details.additional_facts: The crime involved the murder of Damyanti, the mother of the complainant, during a robbery at her residence. The accused were domestic helpers who had access to the house. The incident occurred on the morning of 15/12/1995 when the family members were away. The accused were convicted based on evidence including the recovery of stolen items.
